channel.title: Current project; need ideas
channel.description:
Alright, I'm making a thing where you choose a path and you get some armor and stuff. 'Tis pretty sweet. But I don't have ideas for the bonuses, so, without further adu......
Berserker..........Small Strength bonus. Slayer..............[red]Gets to wear slayer equips, can use Slayer Dart.[/red] Defender...........Small Defense bonus. Sage................Need ideas. Magician...........Need ideas. Staveman..........[green]Can craft staffs, gets bonuses from staffs.[/green] Ranger..............More benefits from range equipment, can equip Crystal Bow. Hunter..............[red]Gets unlimited energy.[/red] Sniper..............[red]Gets Full Camo, (will be) best ranging armor.[/red] Merchant...........Way to make money from Path Master. Gambler............Gain money; lose money game. Executioner........Need ideas. Hero..................[blue]Small bonus in attack, defense, and strength.[/blue] Spearman...........Need ideas. Enchanter...........Ice Barrage freeze time +.
Things in [red]RED[/red] were suggestions from Mod Taharok.
Things in [green]GREEN[/green] were suggestions from Pookey 71.
Things in [blue]BLUE[/blue] were suggestions from ThatOneServer.
Things in BROWN are Paths that I have completed.

item.title: Current project; need ideas
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Ok here is my personaly list (indented ones on the list are my personally-made ones) on the matter so take some new ones/look at old ideas updated:

Berserker…Has high strength. Gets special blunt weapons and armors (fremmy helms, fremmy armor is class armor)
Slayer…Has high slayer and attack. Gets special staff a spell [slayer staff + spell] (slayer equipment is class armor/weapon)
Defender…Has VERY high defence. Gets special shields (Castlewars is class armor)
Sage…Gets to use ancient magicks. Gets special robes and staffs (Ahrim’s robes are class armor {lunar when it comes out})
Magician…Gets to use normal magics. Gets special robes and staffs (
Staveman…Gets moderate defence and moderate attack. Gets special armor and weapons (white knight set is class armor/weapons)
Ranger…Gets moderate ranging skills. Gets special armor and bow (Kairl’s armor and karils’s bow are the class armor + bow)
Hunter…Gets high ranging skills and moderate agility. Gets special clothing (rogue outfits are class clothes)
Sniper…Gets VERY high ranging skills and infinite energy. Gets special cloth armor (camo is class cloth armor)
Merchant…Auto-maticly can get 1k from class master at 1 time. Gets special outfit (yellow team cape, yellow boots, yellow gloves, and a yellow phat is the class outfit)
Gambler…Gets to play a gambling mini-game. Gets special outfit (Cape of Legends, desert boots, cooking gauntlets, and a white phat is the class outfit)
Executioner…VERY high strength. Gets special axe and armor (Dharok’s gr8 axe and armor is the class armor + weapon)
Hero…Has moderate attack, strength, defence. Gets special armor (rune (t) armor is class armor)
Spearman…Has low defence and low attack but moderate agility. Gets special spears (any of the Mojhlorns for class spears)
Enchanter…Has VERY high magic. Gets specail robes and wands (gets all wanda and infinity [NOT MAGE BOOK])
Necromancer…Has VERY high magic and also is on the evil side. Gets special armor (Black armor is class armor/weapons)
Paladin…Has high magic and VERY high attack, strength, and defence. Get special armor and book (Intitiate and mage book is class armor)
Chaos Paladin…Has VERY high magic, attack, strength, defence, and has unlimited energy. Gets all stuff that Necros, Paladins, and Enchanter’s get as class armors.
Battle Warlord…Has VERY high attack, strength, defence, and ranged. Class armor is Black armors and White knight armors

Ok these are separated into 4 categories:

Starting class (any class you can pick from begginig) = green

Advanced class (a class you can pick after reaching a certain level in a starting class) = orange

Master class (a class that you can only have by mastering out 2 advanced classes of a certain type [only allowed up to 2 advanced classes per account]) = red

Special class (only admins can pick sepcial people for these classes) = purple

Ok so these are the Advanced classes and what starting class to advace it takes to get into them:

[center][glow=orange,2,300]/ Advanced class [/glow][/center]

[center]Defender[/center]
[center]Staveman[/center]

[center]Hunter[/center]
[center]Ranger[/center]

[center]This is one of the rare times it uses another advanced class:[/center]
[center]Sniper[/center]
[center]Hunter[/center]

[center]Gambler[/center]
[center]Merchant[/center]

[center]Executioner[/center]
[center]Berserker[/center]

[center][glow=red,2,300]Master Classes[/glow][/center]

[center]Enchanter[/center]
[center]Magician
Sage[/center]

[center]Necromancer[/center]
[center]Sage
Executioner[/center]

[center]Paladin[/center]
[center]Magician
Defender[/center]

[center]Battle Warlord[/center]
[center]Defender
Executioner[/center]

[center][glow=purple,2,300]Admins-picker classes[/glow][/center]

[center]Chaos Paladin[/center]
[center]These are only suggested needed before a admin picked (more then 2)
Enchanter
Paladin
Necromancer
Battle Warlord[/center]

Ok so now this is what each of this different classes would do:

Berserker

              Ok berserkers would mainly have to get their strength up. Special tasks they would have to do would be like to raid other people's class bases.

Slayer

              Slayer people would of course have to slay. Their class masters would assign tasks for them. The monsters/objects that they would slay also would give them SPECIAL AND UNIQUE items that would give them wealth.

Sage

              Sages would mainly guard their class base (hopefully designed by the mage arena) and they would also practice their spells in the arena.

Magician

              These guys would mainly runecraft runes and guard their bases.

Staveman

              These guys give it their all as they glamourously charge into the duel arena for fame, riches, and protection.

Ranger

              These guys sit at the ranging guild firing arrows at the targets and fletch all day.

Merchant

              They travel the world and banks to get low-priced items to sell for hugh profits.

Hero

              These guys stay in Ardougne mostly guarding the stalls and walls of the magnificent city.

Spearman

              These guys ride off into battle and guard the northern terrotories of Edgeville from attacks.

Defender

              These guys completely guard and protect their base (in castlewars!) by attacking the other classes' base.

Hunter

              These hunters sit all around the world hunting all of the stuff slayers would not even dare to come close to.

Sniper

              Their goal is not to defend like the Defenders, but to take out their arch-enimy by solid ATTACK force upon them.

Gambler

              Their greed and contempent keeps them obsoulete. They cheat people and merchenter's out of their money and then spend it foolishly on gambling games just to loose it all again.

Executioner

              Gets daily assignments from the kings around the world to hunt down and kill any player that kingdom wishes dead (like a bounty hunter)

Enchanter

              Sit and control the rune shops. Then they blast the way through the Magician and Sages' homes for target practice and fun.

Necromance

              By controling the evil ways they have an ultimate level 40-55 wilderness battle with the Paladins (takes that much wildy from the size of the armies).

Paladin

              By controling the ways of the good they have an ultimate level 40-55 wilderness battle with the Paladins (takes that much wildy from the size of the armies).

Battle Warlord

              These guys control the raids in the castlewars arena. They also are the raiders of the spearmen home of Edgeville.

[glow=black,2,300]Chaos Paladin[/glow]

              They are here to destroy all thet we know. These maginifcent and powerful beings control the entire way the world is run in RS2 private servers. These guys are the main rulers of the entire chaostic battles (battles between Paladins and Necromancers). They also are the Masters of the "Battle of the skills" (Castlewar battles). These are true Masters of the game and deserve the ultimate glory that the receive.

Enjoy my ultimate guide on this topic. I was a little tired so I didnt add the class bases. But if you like my ideas then I may think them up. Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic
